metadata.title: USN-4545-1 -- libquicktime vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that libquicktime incorrectly handled certain malformed MP4 files. If a user were tricked into opening a specially crafted MP4 file, a remote attacker could use this issue to cause a denial of service (resource exhaustion). (CVE-2017-9122)  It was discovered that libquicktime incorrectly handled certain malformed MP4 files. If a user were tricked into opening a specially crafted MP4 file, a remote attacker could use this issue to cause libquicktime to crash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2017-9123, CVE-2017-9124, CVE-2017-9126, CVE-2017-9127, CVE-2017-9128)  It was discovered that libquicktime incorrectly handled certain malformed MP4 files. If a user were tricked into opening a specially crafted MP4 file, a remote attacker could use this issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2017-9125)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4545-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  quicktime-x11utils - 2:1.2.4-7+deb8u1ubuntu0.1 libquicktime-doc - 2:1.2.4-7+deb8u1ubuntu0.1 libquicktime-dev - 2:1.2.4-7+deb8u1ubuntu0.1 libquicktime2 - 2:1.2.4-7+deb8u1ubuntu0.1 quicktime-utils - 2:1.2.4-7+deb8u1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
